name: Adam
detail: Adam was created by G-d on the sixth day (Genesis 2:19, Genesis 5:5)
detailEn: Adam was created by G-d on the sixth day (Genesis 2:19, Genesis 5:5)
detailTe: ఆదాము ఆరవ దినమున దేవుడు సృష్టించెను (ఆదికాండము 2:19, ఆదికాండము 5:5)

children.name: Abel
children.detail: (Genesis 4:2, Genesis 4:8) - The first murder victim, killed by his brother Cain
children.detailTe: (ఆదికాండము 4:2, ఆదికాండము 4:8) - మొదటి హత్య బాధితుడు, అతని సోదరుడు కయీనుచే చంపబడెను
children.detailEn: (Genesis 4:2, Genesis 4:8) - The first murder victim, killed by his brother Cain

children.name: Cain
children.detail: (Genesis 4:1, Genesis 4:16) - First born son of Adam and Eve, murdered his brother Abel
children.detailTe: (ఆదికాండము 4:1, ఆదికాండము 4:16) - ఆదాము మరియు హవ్వల మొదటి కుమారుడు, తన సోదరుడు హేబెలును చంపెను
children.detailEn: (Genesis 4:1, Genesis 4:16) - First born son of Adam and Eve, murdered his brother Abel

children.name: Enoch
children.detail: (Genesis 4:17) - Son of Cain, first city was named after him
children.detailTe: (ఆదికాండము 4:17) - కయీను కుమారుడు, మొదటి పట్టణము అతని పేరుతో పేర్కొనబడింది
children.detailEn: (Genesis 4:17) - Son of Cain, first city was named after him

children.name: Irad
children.detail: (Genesis 4:18) - Son of Enoch, grandson of Cain
children.detailEn: (Genesis 4:18) - Son of Enoch, grandson of Cain

children.name: Mehujael
children.detail: (Genesis 4:18) - Son of Irad, great-grandson of Cain
children.detailEn: (Genesis 4:18) - Son of Irad, great-grandson of Cain

children.name: Methushael
children.detail: (Genesis 4:18) - Son of Mehujael, great-great-grandson of Cain
children.detailEn: (Genesis 4:18) - Son of Mehujael, great-great-grandson of Cain

children.name: Lamech
children.detail: (Genesis 4:18-24) - Son of Methushael, father of Jabal, Jubal, and Tubal-Cain
children.detailTe: (ఆదికాండము 4:18-24) - మతూషాయేలు కుమారుడు, యాబాలు, యూబాలు మరియు తూబల్కయీను తండ్రి
children.detailEn: (Genesis 4:18-24) - Son of Methushael, father of Jabal, Jubal, and Tubal-Cain

_children.name: Jabal
_children.detail: He was the father of those who dwell in tents and have livestock (Genesis 4:20)
_children.detailTe: అతడు పశువులు గలవాడై గుడారములలో నివసించువారికి మూలపురుషుడు (ఆదికాండము 4:20)
_children.detailEn: He was the father of those who dwell in tents and have livestock (Genesis 4:20)

_children.name: Jubal
_children.detail: He was the father of all those who play the lyre and pipe (Genesis 4:21)
_children.detailTe: ఇతడు సితారాను సానికను వాడుక చేయువారికందరికిని మూలపురుషుడ (ఆదికాండము 4:21)
_children.detailEn: He was the father of all those who play the lyre and pipe (Genesis 4:21)

_children.name: Tubal-Cain
_children.detail: He was the forger of all implements of bronze and iron (Genesis 4:22)
_children.detailTe: అతడు పదునుగల రాగి పని ముట్లన్నిటిని ఇనుప పనిముట్లన్నిటిని చేయువాడు (ఆదికాండము 4:22)
_children.detailEn: He was the forger of all implements of bronze and iron (Genesis 4:22)

children.name: Noah
children.detail:
(Genesis 5:28-29, 1 Chronicles 1:4, Luke 3:36)

The Flood came when Noah was 600 years old (Genesis 7:6)

(Genesis 9:29)

children.name: Shem
children.detail:
(Genesis 5:32, 1 Chronicles 1:4, Luke 3:36)(Genesis 11:10-11)

Shem was the oldest of Noah's sons (Shem is older than Japheth- Genesis 10:21, Ham is the youngest son- Genesis 9:22-24)

children.name: Eber (or Heber)
children.detail:
(Genesis 10:24, 1 Chronicles 1:18, Luke 3:35, Genesis 11:17-18)

Eber/Heber is the person who became the father of the Hebrews. Abram was the first to be called a Hebrew in Scripture (Genesis 14:13).

children.name: Peleg
children.detail:
(Genesis 10:25, 1 Chronicles 1:19, Luke 3:35, Genesis 11:18-19)

The first person of Scripture's genealogies to die after the Flood was someone born after the Flood: Peleg.

children.name: Lot
children.detail:
(Genesis 11:27)

Lot and his family were the only ones saved from the destruction of Sodom and Gomorrah (Genesis 19:29)
children.detailTe:
(ఆదికాండము 11:27)

లోతు కాపురమున్న పట్టణములను నాశనము చేసినప్పుడు ఆ నాశనముమధ్యన లోతు నశించకుండ అతని తప్పించెను (ఆదికాండము 19:29)
children.detailEn:
(Genesis 11:27)

Lot and his family were the only ones saved from the destruction of Sodom and Gomorrah (Genesis 19:29)

children.name: Abram/Abraham
children.detail:
(Genesis 11:26, 1 Chronicles 1:26-27, Luke 3:34, Genesis 25:7-10)

G-d renamed Abram to Abraham (Genesis 17:5).

Abram was the first person called 'Hebrew' in the Bible (Genesis 14:13).

Abram was born 1948 years from the creation of the world.

children.name: Ishmael
children.detailTe:
(ఆదికాండము 16:16, 1 దినవృత్తాంతములు 1:28, ఆదికాండము 25:17)

అతడు పెరిగి పెద్దవాడై ఆ అరణ్యములో కాపురముండి విలుకాడాయెను. (ఆదికాండము 21:20).

children.name: Isaac
children.detail:
(Genesis 21:5, 1 Chronicles 1:34, Luke 3:34, Genesis 35:28-29)

G-d named Isaac before he was even born (Genesis 17:19).

children.name: Esau (Edom)
children.detail:
(Genesis 25:25, 1 Chronicles 1:34)

G-d declared that Esau would serve his younger twin brother, Jacob, before they were born (Genesis 25:23).

children.name: Amalekites
children.detail: There is a commandment to remember what Amalek did to Israel and to blot out their name from under heaven. (Deuteronomy 25:17-19)
children.detailTe: నీ దేవుడైన యెహోవా నీకు విశ్రాంతి దయచేసిన తరువాత ఆకాశము క్రింద నుండి అమాలేకీయుల పేరు తుడిచివేయవలెను. ఇది మరచిపోవద్దు (ద్వితియోపదేశాకాండము 25:17-19)
children.detailEn: There is a commandment to remember what Amalek did to Israel and to blot out their name from under heaven. (Deuteronomy 25:17-19)

(Genesis 25:25, 1 Chronicles 1:34)

G-d declared that Esau would serve his younger twin brother, Jacob, before they were born (Genesis 25:23).

children.name: Jacob/Israel
children.detail:
(Genesis 21:26, 1 Chronicles 1:34, Luke 3:34, Genesis 49:33)

G-d changed Jacob's name to Israel (Genesis 32:28).

children.name: Reuben
children.detail:
(Genesis 29:32, 1 Chronicles 2:1, 1 Chronicles 5:1)

More details are available
at Psalm11918.org

children.name: Dathan
children.detail:
(Numbers 26:9)

Dathan (and Abiram) contended against Moses and Aaron (Numbers 26:9)
children.detailTe:
(సంఖ్యాకాండము 26:9)

కోరహు తన సమూహములో పేరు పొందినవాడు; అతని సమాజము యెహోవాకు విరోధముగా వాదించినప్పుడు సమాజములో మోషే అహరోనులకు విరోధముగా వాదించిన దాతాను అబీరాములు వీరు. (సంఖ్యాకాండము 26:9)
children.detailEn:
(Numbers 26:9)

Dathan (and Abiram) contended against Moses and Aaron (Numbers 26:9)

children.name: Abiram
children.detail:
(Numbers 26:9)

Abiram (and Dathan) contended against Moses and Aaron (Numbers 26:9)
children.detailTe:
(సంఖ్యాకాండము 26:9)

కోరహు తన సమూహములో పేరు పొందినవాడు; అతని సమాజము యెహోవాకు విరోధముగా వాదించినప్పుడు సమాజములో మోషే అహరోనులకు విరోధముగా వాదించిన దాతాను అబీరాములు వీరు. (సంఖ్యాకాండము 26:9)
children.detailEn:
(Numbers 26:9)

Abiram (and Dathan) contended against Moses and Aaron (Numbers 26:9)

children.name: Beerah
children.detail: (1 Chronicles 5:6)Tilgath-pilneser of Assyria carried him away into exile.
children.detailTe: (1 దినవృత్తాంతములు 5:6)అష్షూరు రాజైన తిగ్లత్పిలేసెరు అతని చెరతీసికొని పోయెను.
children.detailEn: (1 Chronicles 5:6)Tilgath-pilneser of Assyria carried him away into exile.

children.detailTe:
(ఆదికాండము 29:32, 1 దినవృత్తాంతములు 2:1, 1 దినవృత్తాంతములు 5:1)

More details are available
at Psalm11918.org
children.detailEn:
(Genesis 29:32, 1 Chronicles 2:1, 1 Chronicles 5:1)

More details are available
at Psalm11918.org

children.name: Simeon
children.detail:
(Genesis 29:33, 1 Chronicles 2:1)

More details are available
at Psalm11918.org

(ఆదికాండము 29:33, 1 దినవృత్తాంతములు 2:1)

at Psalm11918.org

(Genesis 29:33, 1 Chronicles 2:1)

children.name: Levi
children.detail:
(Genesis 29:34, 1 Chronicles 2:1)

More details are available
at Psalm11918.org

children.name: Gershon (Gershom)
children.detail:
(Genesis 46:11, Exodus 6:16, Numbers 3:17, 1 Chronicles 2:1, 6:1, 6:16, 6:43)

The families of the Gershonites were to camp behind the tabernacle westward (Numbers 3:23).
children.detailTe:
(ఆదికాండము 46:11, నిర్గమకాండము 6:16, సంఖ్యాకాండము 3:17, 1 దినవృత్తాంతములు 2:1, 6:1, 6:16, 6:43)

గెర్షోనీయుల వంశములు మందిరము వెనుకను, అనగా పడమటి దిక్కున దిగవలెను (సంఖ్యాకాండము 3:23).
children.detailEn:
(Genesis 46:11, Exodus 6:16, Numbers 3:17, 1 Chronicles 2:1, 6:1, 6:16, 6:43)

The families of the Gershonites were to camp behind the tabernacle westward (Numbers 3:23).

children.name: Kohath
children.detail:
(Genesis 46:11, Exodus 6:16, Numbers 3:17, 1 Chronicles 2:1, 6:1, 6:16)

The families of the sons of Kohath were to camp on the southward side of the tabernacle (Numbers 3:29).

children.name: Aaron
children.detail:
(Exodus 6:20, Numbers 26:59, 1 Chronicles 6:3, 1 Chronicles 23:13)

Moses, Aaron, and his sons were to camp before the tabernacle eastward, toward the sunrise (Numbers 3:38).

children.name: Eleazar
children.detail:
(Exodus 6:23, Numbers 3:2, Numbers 26:60, 1 Chronicles 6:3, 6:50, 24:1, Ezra 7:5)

Moses, Aaron, and his sons were to camp before the tabernacle eastward, toward the sunrise (Numbers 3:38).

children.name: Phinehas
children.detail:
(Exodus 6:25, Numbers 25:7-8, 1 Chronicles 6:50, Ezra 7:5)

The LORD gave Phinehas His covenant of peace- covenant of a perpetual priesthood (Numbers 25:11-13)

children.name: Jehozadak
children.detail:
(1 Chronicles 6:14)

Jehozadak was high priest (Haggai 1:1) when Judah and Jerusalem were carried away into exile by Nebuchadnezzar (1 Chronicles 6:15).
children.detailTe:
(1 దినవృత్తాంతములు 6:14)

ప్రధానయాజకుడును యెహోజాదాకు (హగ్గయి 1:1) యెహోవా నెబు కద్నెజరుద్వారా యూదావారిని యెరూషలేమువారిని చెరతీసికొని పోయినప్పుడు ఈ యెహోజాదాకు చెరలోనికి పోయెను(1 దినవృత్తాంతములు 6:15).
children.detailEn:
(1 Chronicles 6:14)

Jehozadak was high priest (Haggai 1:1) when Judah and Jerusalem were carried away into exile by Nebuchadnezzar (1 Chronicles 6:15).

children.name: Ezra
children.detail: (Ezra 7:1)Ezra was the priest who returned to Jerusalem after the Babylonian captivity and recorded the events in the book of the Bible named Ezra.
children.detailTe: (ఎజ్రా 7:1) ఈ సంగతులు జరిగినపిమ్మట పారసీకదేశపు రాజైన అర్తహషస్తయొక్క యేలుబడిలో ఎజ్రా బబులోను దేశమునుండి యెరూషలేముపట్టణమునకు వచ్చెను. .
children.detailEn: (Ezra 7:1)Ezra was the priest who returned to Jerusalem after the Babylonian captivity and recorded the events in the book of the Bible named Ezra.

children.detailTe:
(నిర్గమకాండము 6:25, సంఖ్యాకాండము 25:7-8, 1 దినవృత్తాంతములు 6:50, ఎజ్రా 7:5)

కాబట్టి నీవు అతనితో ఇట్లనుము అతనితో నేను నా సమాధాన నిబంధనను చేయుచున్నాను. (సంఖ్యాకాండము 25:11-13)
children.detailEn:
(Exodus 6:25, Numbers 25:7-8, 1 Chronicles 6:50, Ezra 7:5)

The LORD gave Phinehas His covenant of peace- covenant of a perpetual priesthood (Numbers 25:11-13)

children.detailTe:
(నిర్గమకాండము 6:23, సంఖ్యాకాండము 3:2, సంఖ్యాకాండము 26:60, 1 దినవృత్తాంతములు 6:3, 6:50, 24:1, ఎజ్రా 7:5)

మందిరము ఎదుటి తూర్పుదిక్కున, అనగా ప్రత్యక్షపు గుడారము ఎదుటి పూర్వదిశయందు దిగవలసినవారు మోషే అహరోనులు అహరోను కుమారులు (సంఖ్యాకాండము 3:38).
children.detailEn:
(Exodus 6:23, Numbers 3:2, Numbers 26:60, 1 Chronicles 6:3, 6:50, 24:1, Ezra 7:5)

Moses, Aaron, and his sons were to camp before the tabernacle eastward, toward the sunrise (Numbers 3:38).

children.name: Ithamar
children.detail:
(Exodus 6:23, Numbers 3:2, Numbers 26:60, 1 Chronicles 6:3, 1 Chronicles 24:1)

Moses, Aaron, and his sons were to camp before the tabernacle eastward, toward the sunrise (Numbers 3:38).
children.detailTe:
(నిర్గమకాండము 6:23, సంఖ్యాకాండము 3:2, సంఖ్యాకాండము 26:60, 1 దినవృత్తాంతములు 6:3, 1 దినవృత్తాంతములు 24:1)

మందిరము ఎదుటి తూర్పుదిక్కున, అనగా ప్రత్యక్షపు గుడారము ఎదుటి పూర్వదిశయందు దిగవలసినవారు మోషే అహరోనులు అహరోను కుమారులు(సంఖ్యాకాండము 3:38).
children.detailEn:
(Exodus 6:23, Numbers 3:2, Numbers 26:60, 1 Chronicles 6:3, 1 Chronicles 24:1)

Moses, Aaron, and his sons were to camp before the tabernacle eastward, toward the sunrise (Numbers 3:38).

children.detailTe:
(నిర్గమకాండము 6:20, సంఖ్యాకాండము 26:59, 1 దినవృత్తాంతములు 6:3, 1 దినవృత్తాంతములు 23:13)

Moses, Aaron, and his sons were to camp before the tabernacle eastward, toward the sunrise (సంఖ్యాకాండము 3:38).
children.detailEn:
(Exodus 6:20, Numbers 26:59, 1 Chronicles 6:3, 1 Chronicles 23:13)

Moses, Aaron, and his sons were to camp before the tabernacle eastward, toward the sunrise (Numbers 3:38).

children.name: Moses
children.detail:
(Exodus 6:20, Numbers 26:59, 1 Chronicles 6:3, 1 Chronicles 23:13)

Moses, Aaron, and his sons were to camp before the tabernacle eastward, toward the sunrise (Numbers 3:38).

children.name: Shelomoth
children.detail:
(1 Chronicles 26:24-25)

Shelomoth and his relatives were the treasurers of the Tabernacle over anything that was dedicated to the LORD during the days of Samuel the Seer and King Saul. (1 Chronicles 26:28)
children.detailTe:
(1 దినవృత్తాంతములు 26:24-25)

దీర్ఘదర్శి సమూయేలును కీషు కుమారుడైన సౌలును నేరు కుమారుడైన అబ్నేరును సెరూయా కుమారుడైన యోవాబును ప్రతిష్ఠించిన సొమ్మంతయు షెలోమీతు చేతిక్రిందను వాని సహోదరుల చేతిక్రిందను ఉంచబడెను (1 దినవృత్తాంతములు 26:28)
children.detailEn:
(1 Chronicles 26:24-25)

Shelomoth and his relatives were the treasurers of the Tabernacle over anything that was dedicated to the LORD during the days of Samuel the Seer and King Saul. (1 Chronicles 26:28)

children.detailTe:
(నిర్గమకాండము 6:20, సంఖ్యాకాండము 26:59, 1 దినవృత్తాంతములు 6:3, 1 దినవృత్తాంతములు 23:13)

మందిరము ఎదుటి తూర్పుదిక్కున, అనగా ప్రత్యక్షపు గుడారము ఎదుటి పూర్వదిశయందు దిగవలసినవారు మోషే అహరోనులు అహరోను కుమారులు(సంఖ్యాకాండము 3:38).
children.detailEn:
(Exodus 6:20, Numbers 26:59, 1 Chronicles 6:3, 1 Chronicles 23:13)

Moses, Aaron, and his sons were to camp before the tabernacle eastward, toward the sunrise (Numbers 3:38).

children.name: Korah
children.detail:
(Exodus 6:21, 1 Chronicles 6:22, 1 Chronicles 6:37)

This is the Korah that rose up with Dathan and Abiram against Moses and Aaron (Korah's rebellion) as recorded in Numbers 16:1-40.

The sons of Korah are credited with writing several Psalms (42, 44, 45, 46, 47, 48, 49, 84, 85, 87, & 88).
children.detailTe:
(నిర్గమకాండము 6:21, 1 దినవృత్తాంతములు 6:22, 1 దినవృత్తాంతములు 6:37)

This is the Korah that rose up with Dathan and Abiram against Moses and Aaron (Korah's rebellion) as recorded in సంఖ్యాకాండము 16:1-40.

The sons of Korah are credited with writing several Psalms (42, 44, 45, 46, 47, 48, 49, 84, 85, 87, & 88).
children.detailEn:
(Exodus 6:21, 1 Chronicles 6:22, 1 Chronicles 6:37)

This is the Korah that rose up with Dathan and Abiram against Moses and Aaron (Korah's rebellion) as recorded in Numbers 16:1-40.

The sons of Korah are credited with writing several Psalms (42, 44, 45, 46, 47, 48, 49, 84, 85, 87, & 88).

children.detailTe:
(ఆదికాండము 46:11, నిర్గమకాండము 6:16, సంఖ్యాకాండము 3:17, 1 దినవృత్తాంతములు 2:1, 6:1, 6:16)

కహాతు కుమారుల వంశములు మందిరముయొక్క ప్రక్కను, అనగా దక్షిణదిక్కున దిగవలసినవారు (సంఖ్యాకాండము 3:29).
children.detailEn:
(Genesis 46:11, Exodus 6:16, Numbers 3:17, 1 Chronicles 2:1, 6:1, 6:16)

The families of the sons of Kohath were to camp on the southward side of the tabernacle (Numbers 3:29).

children.name: Merari
children.detail:
(Genesis 46:11, Exodus 6:16, Numbers 3:17, 1 Chronicles 2:1, 6:1, 6:16)

The families of the sons of Merari were to camp on the northward side of the tabernacle (Numbers 3:35).
children.detailTe:
(ఆదికాండము 46:11, నిర్గమకాండము 6:16, సంఖ్యాకాండము 3:17, 1 దినవృత్తాంతములు 2:1, 6:1, 6:16)

మెరారీయుల పితరుల కుటుంబములో అబీహా యిలు కుమారుడైన సూరీయేలు ప్రధానుడు. వారు మందిరమునొద్ద ఉత్తరదిక్కున దిగవలసినవారు (సంఖ్యాకాండము 3:35).
children.detailEn:
(Genesis 46:11, Exodus 6:16, Numbers 3:17, 1 Chronicles 2:1, 6:1, 6:16)

The families of the sons of Merari were to camp on the northward side of the tabernacle (Numbers 3:35).

children.name: Er
children.detail:
(Genesis 38:2-3, Genesis 46:12, 1 Chronicles 2:3)

Er was evil in the sight of the LORD, so the LORD took his life. (Genesis 38:7)
children.detailTe:
(ఆదికాండము 38:2-3, ఆదికాండము 46:12, 1 దినవృత్తాంతములు 2:3)

ఏరు యెహోవా దృష్టికి చెడ్డవాడైనందున ఆయన వానిని చంపెను. (ఆదికాండము 38:7)
children.detailEn:
(Genesis 38:2-3, Genesis 46:12, 1 Chronicles 2:3)

Er was evil in the sight of the LORD, so the LORD took his life. (Genesis 38:7)

children.name: Onan
children.detail:
(Genesis 38:2-4, Genesis 46:12, 1 Chronicles 2:3, Genesis 38:9-10)

Onan did what was displeasing in the sight of the Lord, so He took his life. (Genesis 38:10)
children.detailTe:
(ఆదికాండము 38:2-4, ఆదికాండము 46:12, 1 దినవృత్తాంతములు 2:3, ఆదికాండము 38:9-10)

అతడు చేసినది యెహోవా దృష్టికి చెడ్డది గనుక ఆయన అతనికూడ చంపెను. (ఆదికాండము 38:10)
children.detailEn:
(Genesis 38:2-4, Genesis 46:12, 1 Chronicles 2:3, Genesis 38:9-10)

Onan did what was displeasing in the sight of the Lord, so He took his life. (Genesis 38:10)

children.name: Jephunneh
children.detail: Caleb is the son of Jephunneh (Numbers 13:6) who was a Kenizzite (Numbers 32:12) of the tribe of Judah (Numbers 13:6).  Kenizzites were Canaanites (Genesis 15:18-21).  Judah's first wife, Shua, was a Canaanite woman(Genesis 28:2, 12).  She bore him Er, Onan, and Shelah (1 Chronicles 2:3) but Er and Onan died.  Ergo, it is likely Caleb is descended from Shelah.

children.name: Caleb
children.detail: Caleb is the son of Jephunneh (Numbers 13:6) who was a Kenizzite (Numbers 32:12) of the tribe of Judah (Numbers 13:6).  Kenizzites were Canaanites (Genesis 15:18-21).  Judah's first wife (Shua's daughter) was a Canaanite woman(Genesis 38:2, 12).  She bore him Er, Onan, and Shelah (1 Chronicles 2:3) but Er and Onan died.  Ergo, it is likely Caleb is descended from Shelah.
children.detailTe: Caleb is the son of Jephunneh (సంఖ్యాకాండము 13:6) who was a Kenizzite (సంఖ్యాకాండము 32:12) of the tribe of Judah (సంఖ్యాకాండము 13:6).  Kenizzites were Canaanites (ఆదికాండము 15:18-21).  Judah's first wife (Shua's daughter) was a Canaanite woman(ఆదికాండము 38:2, 12).  She bore him Er, Onan, and Shelah (1 దినవృత్తాంతములు 2:3) but Er and Onan died.  Ergo, it is likely Caleb is descended from Shelah.
children.detailEn: Caleb is the son of Jephunneh (Numbers 13:6) who was a Kenizzite (Numbers 32:12) of the tribe of Judah (Numbers 13:6).  Kenizzites were Canaanites (Genesis 15:18-21).  Judah's first wife (Shua's daughter) was a Canaanite woman(Genesis 38:2, 12).  She bore him Er, Onan, and Shelah (1 Chronicles 2:3) but Er and Onan died.  Ergo, it is likely Caleb is descended from Shelah.

children.name: Othniel
children.detailTe:
(యెహోషువ 15:17, న్యాయాధిపతులు 3:9)

అప్పుడు నలువది సంవత్సరములు దేశము నెమ్మదిపొందెను: 1409-1369 BCE (న్యాయాధిపతులు 3:11).

యెఫున్నె కుమారు డైన కాలేబు (సంఖ్యాకాండము 13:6) కెనెజీయుడగు యెఫున్నె కుమారుడైన కాలేబు (సంఖ్యాకాండము 32:12) యూదా గోత్రమునకు యెఫున్నె కుమారు డైన కాలేబు (సంఖ్యాకాండము 13:6).  కేనీయులను  కనిజ్జీయులను కద్మోనీయులను (ఆదికాండము 15:18-21).  Judah's first wife, Shua, was a Canaanite woman(ఆదికాండము 28:2, 12).  She bore him Er, Onan, and Shelah (1 దినవృత్తాంతములు 2:3) but Er and Onan died.  Ergo, it is likely Caleb is descended from Shelah.
children.detailEn: Caleb is the son of Jephunneh (Numbers 13:6) who was a Kenizzite (Numbers 32:12) of the tribe of Judah (Numbers 13:6).  Kenizzites were Canaanites (Genesis 15:18-21).  Judah's first wife, Shua, was a Canaanite woman(Genesis 28:2, 12).  She bore him Er, Onan, and Shelah (1 Chronicles 2:3) but Er and Onan died.  Ergo, it is likely Caleb is descended from Shelah.

children.name: David

children.spouseEn: Ahinoam the Jezreelitess, Abigail the Carmelitess (1 Chronicles 3:1), Maacah, the daughter of Talmai king of Geshur (1 Chronicles 3:2), Haggith (1 Chr 3:2), Abital (1 Chr 3:3), Eglah (1 Chr 3:3), Bath-shua the daughter of Ammiel (1 Chr 3:5)

children.name: Mary
children.detail:
(Matthew 1:16, Luke 3:23, Acts 1:14)

Mary, by whom Jesus was born (Matthew 1:16).
children.detailTe:
(మత్తయి 1:16, లూకా 3:23, అపోస్తలుల కార్యములు 1:14)

యాకోబు మరియ భర్తయైన యోసేపును కనెను, ఆమెయందు క్రీస్తు అనబడిన యేసు పుట్టెను. (మత్తయి 1:16).
children.detailEn:
(Matthew 1:16, Luke 3:23, Acts 1:14)

Mary, by whom Jesus was born (Matthew 1:16).

children.spouseTe: యెజ్రెయేలీయురాలైన అహీనోయము, కర్మెలీయురాలైన అబీగయీలు (1 దినవృత్తాంతములు 3:1), గెషూరు రాజైన తల్మయి కుమార్తెయైన మయకా (1 దినవృత్తాంతములు 3:2), హగ్గీతు (1 Chr 3:2), అబీటలు (1 Chr 3:3), ఎగ్లా (1 Chr 3:3), అమ్మియేలు కుమార్తె యైన బత్షెబ (1 Chr 3:5)

children.name: Achan (or Achar)
children.detail:
(Joshua 7:1, 7:18, 1 Chronicles 2:7)

Achan sinned by taking banned property from Jericho and caused Israel to lose their second major battle in the land at Ai (Joshua 7:5).
children.detailTe:
(యెహోషువ 7:1, 7:18, 1 దినవృత్తాంతములు 2:7)

ఆకాను శపితము చేయబడినదానిలో కొంత తీసికొనెను గనుక యెహోవా ఇశ్రాయేలీయుల మీద కోపించెను. (యెహోషువ 7:5).
children.detailEn:
(Joshua 7:1, 7:18, 1 Chronicles 2:7)

Achan sinned by taking banned property from Jericho and caused Israel to lose their second major battle in the land at Ai (Joshua 7:5).

children.name: Abiezrites
children.detail:
(Judges 6:11)

Although Judges 6 mentions 'Abiezrites', it is not known if it is THIS Abiezer or the son of Hammolecheth from which they derive.
children.detailTe:
(న్యాయాధిపతులు 6:11)

children.name: Jair
children.detail:
(Judges 10:3)

Shechem is a grandchild of Gilead and therefore a Gileadite.

Jair judged Israel twenty-two years.
children.detailTe:
(న్యాయాధిపతులు 10:3)

Jair judged Israel twenty-two years.

children.name: Jephthah
children.detail:
(Judges 10:3)

Aniam is a grandchild of Gilead and therefore a Gileadite.

Jephthah judged Israel six years.
children.detailTe:
(న్యాయాధిపతులు 10:3)

children.name: Joshua
children.detail:
(1 Chronicles 7:27)

This is the Joshua, son of Nun, who was Moses' servant (Exodus 33:11) and who brought the Israelites into their Land (Joshua 6:6). He was 110 years old (Joshua 24:29)
children.detailTe:
(1 దినవృత్తాంతములు 7:27)

This is the యెహోషువ, son of Nun, who was Moses' servant (నిర్గమకాండము 33:11) and who brought the Israelites into their Land (యెహోషువ 6:6). He was 110 years old (యెహోషువ 24:29)
children.detailEn:
(1 Chronicles 7:27)

children.name: Ehud
children.detail:
(1 Chronicles 8:6)

Son of Gera (Judges 3:15)

Ehud was left-handed and used that attribute to enable him to kill Israel's enemy, Eglon the King of Moab (Judges 3:15-4:1).

Ehud judged 80 years: 1369-1289 BCE (Judges 3:30).

_children.name: Shaharaim
_children.spouse: Hushim and Baara (1 Chronicles 8:8), Hodesh (1 Chronicles 8:9)

children.name: Ner (or Abiel)
children.detail: (1 Chronicles 9:36)Ner may have been given the name 'Abiel' (Father of G-d) in 1 Samuel 9:2 because he was the Leverite father of Kish's (his elder brother) son whom he named Kish.

children.name: Merib-baal
children.detail:
(1 Chronicles 9:40)

Called Mephibosheth in 2 Samuel 4 and 2 Samuel 9

(1 Chronicles 9:44)

children.detailTe:
(ఆదికాండము 21:26, 1 దినవృత్తాంతములు 1:34, లూకా 3:34, ఆదికాండము 49:33)

అప్పుడు ఆయననీవు దేవునితోను మనుష్యులతోను పోరాడి గెలిచితివి గనుక ఇకమీదట నీ పేరు ఇశ్రాయేలే గాని యాకోబు అనబడదని చెప్పెను (ఆదికాండము 32:28).
children.detailEn:
(Genesis 21:26, 1 Chronicles 1:34, Luke 3:34, Genesis 49:33)

G-d changed Jacob's name to Israel (Genesis 32:28).

children.detailTe:
(ఆదికాండము 21:5, 1 దినవృత్తాంతములు 1:34, లూకా 3:34, ఆదికాండము 35:28-29)

దేవుడు నీ భార్యయైన శారా నిశ్చయముగా నీకు కుమారుని కనును; నీవతనికి ఇస్సాకు అను పేరు పెట్టుదువు; అతని తరువాత అతని సంతానము కొరకు నిత్యనిబంధనగా నా నిబంధనను అతనితో స్థిరపరచెదను. (ఆదికాండము 17:19).
children.detailEn:
(Genesis 21:5, 1 Chronicles 1:34, Luke 3:34, Genesis 35:28-29)

G-d named Isaac before he was even born (Genesis 17:19).

children.detailTe:
(ఆదికాండము 11:26, 1 దినవృత్తాంతములు 1:26-27, లూకా 3:34, ఆదికాండము 25:7-10)

మరియు ఇకమీదట నీ పేరు అబ్రాము అనబడదు; నిన్ను అనేక జనములకు తండ్రినిగా నియమించితిని గనుక నీ పేరు అబ్రాహాము అన బడును (ఆదికాండము 17:5).

అబ్రహాము మొదటిసారిగా లేఖనములలో హెబ్రీయుడిగా పిలువబడెను (ఆదికాండము 14:13).
children.detailEn:
(Genesis 11:26, 1 Chronicles 1:26-27, Luke 3:34, Genesis 25:7-10)

G-d renamed Abram to Abraham (Genesis 17:5).

Abram was the first person called 'Hebrew' in the Bible (Genesis 14:13).

Abram was born 1948 years from the creation of the world.

children.detailTe:
(ఆదికాండము 10:25, 1 దినవృత్తాంతములు 1:19, లూకా 3:35, ఆదికాండము 11:18-19)

The first person of Scripture's genealogies to die after the Flood was someone born after the Flood: Peleg.
children.detailEn:
(Genesis 10:25, 1 Chronicles 1:19, Luke 3:35, Genesis 11:18-19)

The first person of Scripture's genealogies to die after the Flood was someone born after the Flood: Peleg.

children.detailTe:
(ఆదికాండము 10:24, 1 దినవృత్తాంతములు 1:18, లూకా 3:35, ఆదికాండము 11:17-18)

తప్పించుకొనిన యొకడు వచ్చి హెబ్రీయుడైన అబ్రా మునకు ఆ సంగతి తెలిపెను (ఆదికాండము 14:13).
children.detailEn:
(Genesis 10:24, 1 Chronicles 1:18, Luke 3:35, Genesis 11:17-18)

Eber/Heber is the person who became the father of the Hebrews. Abram was the first to be called a Hebrew in Scripture (Genesis 14:13).

children.name: Aram
children.detail:
(Genesis 10:22, 1 Chronicles 1:17)

The kingdom of Aram was a constant enemy of Israel in the time of the kings (1 Kings 11:23, 1 Kings 20:1, 1 Kings 20:20-23)
children.detailTe:
(ఆదికాండము 10:22, 1 దినవృత్తాంతములు 1:17)

The kingdom of Aram was a constant enemy of Israel in the time of the రాజులు (1 రాజులు 11:23, 1 రాజులు 20:1, 1 రాజులు 20:20-23)
children.detailEn:
(Genesis 10:22, 1 Chronicles 1:17)

The kingdom of Aram was a constant enemy of Israel in the time of the kings (1 Kings 11:23, 1 Kings 20:1, 1 Kings 20:20-23)

children.detailTe:
(ఆదికాండము 5:32, 1 దినవృత్తాంతములు 1:4, లూకా 3:36)(ఆదికాండము 11:10-11)

నోవహు కుమారులలో షేము పెద్దవాడు (షేము యాపెతు కన్నా పెద్దవాడు - ఆదికాండము 10:21, హాము చిన్న కుమారుడు - ఆదికాండము 9:22-24)
children.detailEn:
(Genesis 5:32, 1 Chronicles 1:4, Luke 3:36)(Genesis 11:10-11)

Shem was the oldest of Noah's sons (Shem is older than Japheth- Genesis 10:21, Ham is the youngest son- Genesis 9:22-24)

children.name: Cush
children.detail:
(Genesis 10:6, 1 Chronicles 1:8)

Cush is the Biblical name of the person who became the modern day nation Ethiopia.

_children.name: Nimrod
_children.detail:
(Genesis 10:8-9, 1 Chronicles 1:10)

Nimrod became a 'mighty one' on the earth. The nation of Nimrod became Assyria. (Micah 5:6)
_children.detailTe:
(ఆదికాండము 10:8-9, 1 దినవృత్తాంతములు 1:10)

_children.detailEn:

Cush is the Biblical name of the person who became the modern day nation Ethiopia.
children.detailEn:
(Genesis 10:6, 1 Chronicles 1:8)

Cush is the Biblical name of the person who became the modern day nation Ethiopia.

children.name: Put
children.detail:
(Genesis 10:6, 1 Chronicles 1:8)

Put is the Biblical name of the person who became the modern day nation Libya.
children.detailTe:
(ఆదికాండము 10:6, 1 దినవృత్తాంతములు 1:8)

Put is the Biblical name of the person who became the modern day nation Libya.
children.detailEn:
(Genesis 10:6, 1 Chronicles 1:8)

Put is the Biblical name of the person who became the modern day nation Libya.

children.detailTe:
(ఆదికాండము 5:28-29, 1 దినవృత్తాంతములు 1:4, లూకా 3:36)

ఆ జలప్రవాహము భూమి మీదికి వచ్చినప్పుడు నోవహు ఆరువందల యేండ్లవాడు (ఆదికాండము 7:6)

(ఆదికాండము 9:29)
children.detailEn:
(Genesis 5:28-29, 1 Chronicles 1:4, Luke 3:36)

The Flood came when Noah was 600 years old (Genesis 7:6)

(Genesis 9:29)

detailTe: ఆదాము దేవుని చేత ఆరవ దినమున చేయబడెను (ఆదికాండము 2:19, ఆదికాండము 5:5)
detailEn: Adam was created by G-d on the sixth day (Genesis 2:19, Genesis 5:5)
